text: "Dandelions" is a pop song by Ruth B., released on April 28, 2017. It is from her debut album, Safe Haven. In August 2021, it was re-issued separately in a "slowed + reverb" version. In 2022, the song went viral on TikTok and peaked at the top 10 in India,https://imicharts.com/ Malaysia,https://www.facebook.com/RecordingIndustryMalaysia/photos/pcb.5567735136587144/5567735096587148 Singapore, and the United States.https://www.billboard.com/artist/Ruth-B/chart-history/HBU ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:2017 songs
title: Dandelions (song)
